Uses of Class
model.Position

  • Packages that use Position 
    Package Description
    model  

    • Uses of Position in model

      Methods in model that return Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position Piece.getPosition()
      Return the current position of the piece
      Position Game.getStartPos()
      Returns a starting player portal
      Position Door.leadsTo()
      Returns the Position that the door leads to.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.addPiece(Piece piece, Position position)
      Adds a piece to game as specified by the position
      void Game.addPlayerPortal(Position portal)
      Add starting player portal to the game
      static Wall Wall.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, Position pos)
      Construct Wall piece from an input stream.
      static Key Key.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, Position pos, String description)
      Constructs a Key object from the DataInputStream The object will be broadcast by a master connection, and is then used to create the object in the Client game.
      static Coin Coin.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, Position pos, String description)
      Construct coin piece from an input stream.
      static Assignment Assignment.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, Position pos, String description)
      Construct an assignment piece from an input stream.
      static Player Player.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, String name, Position pos)
      The following constructs a Player given a byte array.
      static ItemsComposite ItemsComposite.fromInputStream(DataInputStream din, String name, String description, Position pos)
      Constructs a ItemsComposite object from the DataInputStream Used to create objects The object will be broadcast by a master connection, and is then used to create the ItemComposite object in the Client game.
      Location Game.getAdjacentSpace(Position position)
      Finds empty space adjacent to the position.
      void Game.movePlayer(int playerId, Position newPos)
      Moves player determined by the playerId to position determined by the newPos.
      void Piece.setPosition(Position position)
      Sets the current position of the piece to position
      Constructors in model with parameters of type Position 
      Constructor and Description
      Assignment(Position position, int id, String description)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Assignment is to be placed in the game and the id (number) of the assignment and a description of the assignments to be displayed on the player's container.
      Coin(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Coin is to be placed in the game and a description of the coin which can be used to give hints to the user.
      Door(Position position, Direction direction, Position leadsTo)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Door is to be placed in the game and a direction of the door.
      Empty(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction) 
      Item(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Item is to be placed in the game and the name and description of the item and also the initial direction.s
      ItemsComposite(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the composite item is to be placed in the game and the name and description of Composite as well as the initial direction of the piece.
      Key(Position position, int number, Direction dir, String description)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Key is to be placed in the game and the id (number) of the key and a description of the key to be displayed on the player's container.
      Piece(Position position, String name, String description, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Piece is to be placed in the game and the name and a description of the Piece also takes in a Direction parameter that determines the initial direction of the piece.
      Player(int playerId, String name, Position pos, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the id of the player, position of where the Player is to be placed in the game and the initial direction of the player
      Wall(Position position, Direction direction)
      Constructor: Takes in the position of where the Wall is to be placed in the game and direction of the wall
